name: theone-suspender
description: Auto-suspend inactive tabs with full manual controls and preferences.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run package && npm run package-crx
scripts.build-zip-only: npm run clean && npm run package
scripts.tag-force-push: node -e "const v=require('../manifest.json').version; try{require('child_process').execSync('git tag -d v'+v, {stdio:'inherit'})}catch(e){} require('child_process').execSync('git tag v'+v, {stdio:'inherit'}); require('child_process').execSync('git push --force origin v'+v, {stdio:'inherit'})"
